name: Mario Judah
description: '''Mario Diamond-Judah Douglas''' (born December 6, 1999) is an American singer-songwriter, rapper and record producer. In 2017, Judah began producing music at the age of 17, with his first commercial single being released in 2020. He rose to prominence as an [[internet meme]] with his single "Die Very Rough" as well as for his sardonic criticism of American rapper [[Playboi Carti]] regarding the delayed release of his second studio album, ''[[Whole Lotta Red]]''.
